name: CodeRed: Agent Sarah's Story - Day one
description: Point-and-click adventure game. Together with special agent Sarah Young, follow and catch dangerous terrorist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7SP1, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: MS DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.7
